sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Form, Table, Card, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; class BondPricingTwo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { label: 'Attach .csv ...', rows: [], totals: [], spinner: false, export: [] }; this.setFilename = this.setFilename.bind(this); this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } setFilename(e) { if (e.target.files.length > 0) { this.setState({ label: e.target.files[0].name }) } } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false, showCards: { visibility: 'visible' } }) } var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const csv = reader.result const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ csv }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/upload', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { let exports = [] exports.push(['Lookup Date', 'Serial Number', 'Series', 'Bond Amount', 'Issue Date', 'Next Accrual', 'Final Maturity', 'Issue Price', 'Interest', 'Interest Rate', 'Bond Value']) for (let i = 0; i < response[0].length; i++) { let values = [ response['vDate'], response['serialNumber'], response['series'], '$' + response['denomination'], response['iDate'], response['aDate'], response['mDate'], '$' + response['iPrice'], '$' + response['interest'], '$' + response['value'] ] exports.push(values); } this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) exports.push([ "", "", "", '$' + response[1]['totalDenominations'], "", "", "", '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalPrices']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalInterests']).toFixed(2), '$' + parseFloat(response[1]['totalValues']).toFixed(2) ]) this.setState({ bonds: response[0], exportResults: exports }) }) } reader.readAsText(e.target.files[0]); } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> ATTACHMENT
{this.state.totals.length > 0 ?
VALUE TOTAL {this.state.totals[0]} AMOUNT TOTAL {this.state.totals[1]} ISSUE PRICE TOTAL {this.state.totals[2]}
: null}
{this.state.rows.length > 0 ? + [Export] : null}
{ this.state.rows.length > 0 ? {this.state.rows.map((result) => ( ))}
Lookup Date Serial Number Bond Type Bond Amount Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Interest Rate Value
{result[0]} {result[1]} {result[2]} {result[3]} {result[4]} {result[5]} {result[6]} {result[7]} {result[8]} {result[9]} {result[10]}
: null}
) } } export default BondPricingTwo;
